registration.title: Create Your Account
registration.metaDescription: Create a secure account with passwordless authentication
registration.emailSent: Verification code sent to your email
registration.checkEmail: Please check your email for the verification code
registration.noPasswordRequired: No password required - we use secure authenticator codes
registration.emailVerificationRequired: Email verification is required to continue
registration.qrInstructions: Scan this QR code with your authenticator app (Google Authenticator, Microsoft Authenticator, Authy, etc.)
registration.manualEntry: Can't scan? Enter this code manually:
registration.manualInstructions: Open your authenticator app, choose 'Enter a setup key', and enter the code above
registration.saveAuthenticatorWarning: Do not lose access to your authenticator! Set a recovery code in the next step.
registration.enterAuthCode: Enter the 6-digit code from your authenticator app
registration.codeChangesEvery30Seconds: If the code doesn't work, wait for the next code
registration.checkTimeSync: Make sure your device's time is synced correctly
registration.waitForNewCode: Wait for a new code to appear and try again
registration.rescanQRCode: Go back and rescan the QR code
registration.recoveryCodeInfo: Set a recovery code to reset your authenticator if you lose access
registration.recoveryCodePlaceholder: Enter a secure recovery code (min 8 characters)
registration.recoveryCodeTip1: Make it at least 12 characters for better security
registration.recoveryCodeTip2: Store it in a password manager or safe place
registration.recoveryCodeTip3: This is different from your TOTP authenticator
registration.saveRecoveryCode: Save this code safely! You'll need it to recover your account
registration.passkeyOptional: Add a passkey for biometric login (Face ID, Touch ID, Windows Hello)
registration.passkeyBenefits: Passkeys provide a faster and more secure way to login:
registration.passkeyBenefit1: Login with Face ID, Touch ID, or Windows Hello
registration.passkeyBenefit2: No need to open your authenticator app
registration.passkeyBenefit3: More secure than codes - uses device biometrics
registration.passkeyRequirements: Your browser or device doesn't support passkeys. You can still use the authenticator app to login.
registration.passkeyAddLater: You can add a passkey later in your account settings
registration.backupCodesInfo: These codes can be used to login if you lose access to your authenticator
registration.backupCodesWarning: Save these codes now! Each code can only be used once. Store them in a secure location.
registration.backupCodeUse1: Use them when you can't access your authenticator
registration.backupCodeUse2: Each code can only be used once
registration.backupCodeUse3: Generate new codes in settings after using them
registration.mustSaveCodes: Please download or copy your codes before continuing
registration.readyToLogin: You can now login to your account

login.title: Welcome Back
login.subtitle: Login to your account
login.useBackupCode: Lost your authenticator? Use backup code

recovery.title: Account Recovery
recovery.subtitle: Recover access to your account
recovery.emailInfo: Enter your email to receive a verification code and start the recovery process
recovery.emailSent: Recovery code sent to your email
recovery.recoveryCodeInfo: Enter the recovery code you set during registration
recovery.setupNewAuth: Set up your new authenticator by scanning the QR code
recovery.canNowLogin: You can now login with your new authenticator

errors.generic: Something went wrong. Please try again.
errors.network: Network error. Please check your connection.
errors.invalidBackupCode: Invalid backup code or already used
errors.passkeyNotSupported: Passkeys are not supported on this device

home.title: Welcome to TopicsFlow
home.subtitle: Select a topic from the sidebar to start chatting, or create a new topic to begin a conversation.
home.createFirstTopic: Create the first topic to get started

profile.title: Edit Profile
profile.subtitle: Update your profile information
profile.bannerFormat: Recommended: 1200x300px. Max 10MB. JPG, PNG, or GIF.
profile.imageFormat: JPG, PNG or GIF. Max size 10MB.
profile.usernameHint: 3-30 characters. Letters, numbers, hyphens, and underscores only.

topics.title: Topics
topics.selectTopic: Select a topic from the list to get started
topics.inviteUsersToTopic: Invite users to join this topic
topics.typeToSearch: Type at least 2 characters to search
topics.tagsHint: Optional. Use lowercase letters, numbers and underscores. Maximum 10 tags.
topics.anonymousModeDescription: Configure anonymous mode for this topic. When enabled, all your actions will be displayed with the chosen anonymous name.

chat.noMessages: No messages yet. Be the first to post!
chat.noMessagesStart: No messages yet. Start the conversation!
chat.sendAnonymously: Send messages anonymously in this topic
chat.backgroundHint: Upload a background image for this chatroom (max 10MB)
chat.photoHint: Upload a photo for this chatroom (max 10MB)
chat.invalidTopic: Invalid topic. Please select a topic first.
chat.invalidTopicId: Invalid topic ID. Please refresh and try again.
chat.confirmKick: Are you sure you want to kick this user?

gifPicker.noGifsInCategory: No GIFs found in this category

settings.title: Settings
settings.subtitle: Manage your account settings and preferences
settings.enableNotificationsDesc: Receive notifications for new messages and mentions
settings.soundEffectsDesc: Play sounds for notifications and messages
settings.twoFactorAuthDesc: TOTP authentication is enabled and active
settings.anonymousPostingDesc: You can post anonymously in topics that allow it. Manage your anonymous identities from the Account tab.
settings.dataPrivacyDesc: Your messages and personal information are stored securely. Only you can see your private messages.
settings.hiddenItemsDesc: Manage topics, posts, chats, and private messages you have hidden

anonymousIdentities.title: Anonymous Identities
anonymousIdentities.subtitle: Manage your anonymous identities across different topics. Each identity is unique to a specific topic.
anonymousIdentities.noIdentitiesDesc: You haven't created any anonymous identities yet. When you send an anonymous message in a topic, an identity will be created automatically.
anonymousIdentities.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this anonymous identity? This cannot be undone.
anonymousIdentities.infoDesc: Anonymous identities allow you to participate in topics without revealing your real username. Each topic can have its own anonymous identity.
anonymousIdentities.warningDesc: Deleting an anonymous identity will remove your association with those messages, but the messages will remain visible in the topic. This action cannot be undone.

notifications.enableBrowserMessage: Get notified about mentions, messages, and updates even when you're not on this page.
notifications.title: Title

notificationDialog.title: Enable Notifications
notificationDialog.description: Get notified when someone mentions you or sends you a private message. You can change this later in your browser settings.
notificationDialog.browserNotSupported: Your browser does not support notifications
notificationDialog.notificationsEnabledBody: You will now receive notifications for mentions and messages

privateMessages.noMessages: No messages yet. Start the conversation!
privateMessages.blockUserConfirm: Are you sure you want to block this user? You will not receive messages from them.
privateMessages.deleteConversationConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this conversation? This action cannot be undone.
privateMessages.searchUsersDescription: Search for users by username or email to start a private conversation.
privateMessages.searchUsersHint: Search for users to start chatting
privateMessages.cannotSendFriendRequestToYourself: Cannot send friend request to yourself
privateMessages.startConversationHint: Search for users to start a conversation

toast.serverError: Server error. Please try again later.
toast.requestTimeout: Request timeout. Please check your connection.
toast.networkError: Network error. Please check your connection.
toast.failedToConnect: Failed to connect to chat server. Please refresh.
toast.connectionError: Connection error. Please refresh the page.
toast.notConnected: Not connected to chat server. Please wait...
toast.failedToSendMessage: Failed to send message. Please try again.
toast.loginSuccessfulRegenerateBackup: Login successful! Consider regenerating your backup codes.
toast.registrationSuccessful: Registration successful! Please set up your authenticator app.

pwa.installDescription: Install our app for a better experience with offline support and faster loading.
pwa.installInstructions: To install: Click the install button (⊕) in your browser's address bar
pwa.iosInstallInstructions: To install: Tap the share button (□↑) and select "Add to Home Screen"
pwa.androidInstallInstructions: To install: Tap the menu (⋮) and select "Install app" or "Add to Home screen"

themes.title: Themes
themes.selectTopicFirst: Please select a topic first to create a theme

posts.title: Title
posts.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this ticket?
posts.deletionRequested: Post deletion requested. It will be permanently deleted in 7 days pending admin approval.

chatRoom.userAlreadyMember: {username} is already a member of this chat

invitations.title: Chat Invitations
invitations.noInvitationsDesc: You don't have any pending chat room invitations.

blocking.blockConfirm: Are you sure you want to block this user?
blocking.blockConfirmMessage: You will not receive messages from them and they won't be able to send you private messages.
blocking.unblockConfirm: Are you sure you want to unblock this user?
blocking.unblockConfirmMessage: They will be able to send you private messages again.

admin.deletedMessagesDesc: Review deleted messages before they are permanently removed
admin.confirmPermanentDelete: Are you sure you want to permanently delete this message? This action cannot be undone.
admin.noBannedUsersDesc: There are currently no banned users.
admin.confirmUnban: Are you sure you want to unban {username}?
admin.predefinedWarning1: Inappropriate behavior detected. Please review our community guidelines.
admin.predefinedWarning2: Your recent actions violate our terms of service. Please be more respectful.
admin.predefinedWarning3: Warning: Harassment or bullying is not tolerated. Continued violations may result in a ban.
admin.predefinedWarning4: Your content has been reported for spam. Please ensure your contributions are meaningful.
admin.predefinedWarning5: Warning: Hate speech or discriminatory content is strictly prohibited.
admin.pendingDeletionsDesc: Review and approve or reject pending deletions
admin.subject: Subject
admin.reasonTooShort: Reason must be at least 10 characters
admin.durationTooShort: Duration must be at least 1 day
admin.banWarning: This action will prevent the user from accessing the platform. Make sure you have reviewed all evidence before proceeding.
admin.durationHint: Ban will expire after the specified number of days (1-365)
admin.reasonPlaceholder: Provide a detailed reason for the ban...

tickets.question: Question
tickets.descriptionPlaceholder: Provide detailed information about your issue or question
tickets.priorityHint: Select the urgency level of your issue
tickets.subject: Subject
tickets.subjectTooShort: Subject must be at least 5 characters
tickets.subjectTooLong: Subject must be less than 200 characters
tickets.descriptionTooShort: Description must be at least 20 characters
tickets.descriptionTooLong: Description must be less than 2000 characters
tickets.createInfo: Submit a support ticket and our team will respond as soon as possible. Please provide as much detail as you can.
tickets.createFirstTicket: Create a ticket if you need help
tickets.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this ticket?
tickets.statusOpenInfo: Your ticket is open and awaiting review
tickets.statusInProgressInfo: Our team is working on your ticket
tickets.messagePlaceholder: Add more details or ask a question...

reports.descriptionPlaceholder: Please provide details about the issue...
reports.descriptionTooShort: Description must be at least 10 characters
reports.descriptionTooLong: Description must be less than 1000 characters
reports.warning: False reports may result in action against your account. Please only report genuine violations.
reports.attachMessageHistory: Attach entire message history with this user
reports.cannotReportYourself: You cannot report yourself or your own content.

messages.ownerDeletionWarning: As the chat owner, you must provide a reason for deleting this message. This will be reported to administrators.
